00027 
00028 PlotTDPs::PlotTDPs(modules::options* opts):
00029    BaseModule("PlotTDPs",opts),fCutHists(false){
00030        fCutHists=!opts->GetFlag("no_cut_histos");
00031        fFastCut=opts->GetDouble("fast_ch_cut",0);
00032        fSlowCut=opts->GetDouble("slow_ch_cut",0);
00033 }

00035 PlotTDPs::~PlotTDPs(){
00036 }
00037 
00038 int PlotTDPs::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00039     // Change into this modules directory
00040     GetDirectory()->cd();
00041 
00042     // Make sure we've got MakeDetectorPulses being used
00043     MakeDetectorPulses* makeTDPs=modules::navigator::Instance()->GetModule<MakeDetectorPulses>("MakeDetectorPulses");
00044     if(!makeTDPs){
00045         cout<<"It's meaningless to use the PlotTDPs module without MakeDetectorPulses as well"<<endl;
00046         return 1;
00047     }
00048     // Make sure MakeDetectorPulses is called before PlotTDPs
00049     if(!modules::navigator::Instance()->Before("MakeDetectorPulses",GetName())){
00050         cout<<"MakeDetectorPulses must be used before PlotTDPs"<<endl;
00051         return 2;
00052     }
00053 
00054     // Init loop variables
00055     IDs::generator passThruId=makeTDPs->GetPassThruGeneratorID();
00056     Detector_t tmp;
00057     std::string name;
00058     std::string title;
00059     std::stringstream full_title;
00060 
00061     // Loop over all TDP sources
00062     for(SourceDetPulseMap::const_iterator i_source=gDetectorPulseMap.begin();
00063             i_source!= gDetectorPulseMap.end(); ++i_source){
00064 
00065         // Ignore TDP sources that use the pass-through generator (so only have
00066         // one valid input channel, like a scintillator or the muScA)
00067         if(i_source->first==passThruId){
00068             cout<<"Skipping TDP source, '"<<i_source->first<<"' as it was made with the pass-through generator"<<endl;
00069             continue;
00070         }
00071 
00072         // make the name and title for the histogram
00073         name='h'+i_source->first.str();
00074         modules::parser::ToCppValid(name);
00075         title=" coming from ";
00076         title+=i_source->first.str();
00077         if(Debug()) {
00078             cout<<"Made histogram called "<<name<<" with title "<< title<<endl;
00079         }
00080 
00081         // Make a histogram of the relative amplitudes
00082         tmp.amplitudes=new TH2F((name+"_amp").c_str(),("Amplitudes of TDPs "+title).c_str(), 100,0,1000,100,0,1000);
00083         tmp.amplitudes->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00084         tmp.amplitudes->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00085         tmp.amplitudes->SetYTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00086 
00087         // Histogram amplitudes for pulses not in either channel
00088         tmp.fast_only_amps=new TH1F((name+"_fast_only_amp").c_str(),
00089                 ("Amplitudes of hits with no corresponding slow pulse "+title).c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00090         tmp.fast_only_amps->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00091         tmp.fast_only_amps->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00092 
00093         // Histogram amplitudes for pulses not in either channel
00094         tmp.slow_only_amps=new TH1F((name+"_slow_only_amp").c_str(),
00095                 ("Amplitudes of hits with no corresponding fast pulse "+title).c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00096         tmp.slow_only_amps->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00097         tmp.slow_only_amps->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00098 
00099         // Make a histogram of the time difference between pulses
00100         full_title.str("Time difference vs. fast amplitude for pulses ");
00101         full_title<<title;
00102         tmp.time_diff_fast=new TH2F((name+"_fast_amp_tdiff").c_str(),full_title.str().c_str(),200,0,-1,200,0,-1);
00103         tmp.time_diff_fast->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00104         tmp.time_diff_fast->SetXTitle("t_{Fast} - t_{Slow}");
00105         tmp.time_diff_fast->SetYTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00106 
00107         full_title.str("Time difference vs. slow amplitude for pulses ");
00108         full_title<<title;
00109         tmp.time_diff_slow=new TH2F((name+"_slow_amp_tdiff").c_str(),full_title.str().c_str(),200,0,-1,200,0,-1);
00110         tmp.time_diff_slow->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00111         tmp.time_diff_slow->SetXTitle("t_{Fast} - t_{Slow}");
00112         tmp.time_diff_slow->SetYTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00113 
00114         if(fCutHists){
00115             // Histogram amplitudes for fast pulses with a slow pulse cut
00116             full_title.str("");
00117             full_title<<"Amplitudes of fast pulses for slow pulses with amplitudes above ";
00118             full_title<<fFastCut<<title;
00119             tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut=new TH1F((name+"_slow_amp_fast_cut").c_str(),
00120                     full_title.str().c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00121             tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00122             tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Slow channel");
00123 
00124             // Histogram amplitudes for slow pulses with a fast pulse cut
00125             full_title.str("");
00126             full_title<<"Amplitudes of slow pulses for fast pulses with amplitudes above ";
00127             full_title<<fSlowCut<<title;
00128             tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut=new TH1F((name+"_fast_amps_slow_cut").c_str(),
00129                     full_title.str().c_str(), 200,0,-1);
00130             tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00131             tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut->SetXTitle("Amplitude in Fast channel");
00132         } else{
00133             tmp.fast_amps_slow_cut=NULL;
00134             tmp.slow_amps_fast_cut=NULL;
00135         }
00136 
00137         // Add tmp to the list of TDPs to draw
00138         fPlotsList[i_source->first]=tmp;
00139     }
00140 
00141     // Change back to the top level directory
00142     GetDirectory()->cd("/");
00143   return 0;
00144 }
00145 
00146 int PlotTDPs::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00147 
00148     // For each TDP source of interest (defined in BeforeFirstEntry)
00149     const DetectorPulseList* pulseList;
00150     SourceDetPulseMap::const_iterator i_pulse_list;
00151     double fast_amp, slow_amp, fast_time, slow_time;
00152     Detector_t plots;
00153     for(PlotsList_t::iterator i_source=fPlotsList.begin();
00154             i_source!=fPlotsList.end(); ++i_source){
00155         // Get the desired pulse list
00156         i_pulse_list=gDetectorPulseMap.find(i_source->first);
00157         if(i_pulse_list== gDetectorPulseMap.end()){
00158             cout<<"Unable to find TDP list for source, "<<i_source->first<<endl;
00159             return 1;
00160         }
00161         pulseList=&i_pulse_list->second;
00162         plots=i_source->second;
00163 
00164         // Loop over the pulse list
00165         for(DetectorPulseList::const_iterator i_pulse=pulseList->begin();
00166                 i_pulse!=pulseList->end(); ++i_pulse){
00167 
00168             // get the amplitudes for each pulse
00169             fast_amp=(*i_pulse)->GetAmplitude(TDetectorPulse::kFast);
00170             slow_amp=(*i_pulse)->GetAmplitude(TDetectorPulse::kSlow);
00171             fast_time=(*i_pulse)->GetTime(TDetectorPulse::kFast);
00172             slow_time=(*i_pulse)->GetTime(TDetectorPulse::kSlow);
00173 
00174             // If one of the channels is the default value then fill the
00175             // histogram for channels that weren't matched
00176             if(fast_amp==definitions::DefaultValue){
00177                 plots.slow_only_amps->Fill(slow_amp);
00178             }else if(slow_amp==definitions::DefaultValue){
00179                 plots.fast_only_amps->Fill(fast_amp);
00180             }else {
00181                 // Both channels saw hits, fill the 2d plot
00182                 plots.amplitudes->Fill(fast_amp ,slow_amp);
00183                 plots.time_diff_fast->Fill(fast_amp ,slow_time - fast_time);
00184                 plots.time_diff_slow->Fill(slow_amp ,slow_time - fast_time);
00185             }
00186 
00187             if(!fCutHists) continue;
00188             // Fill the cut histograms
00189             if(fast_amp> fFastCut && slow_amp!=definitions::DefaultValue){
00190                 plots.slow_amps_fast_cut->Fill(slow_amp);
00191             }
00192             if(slow_amp> fSlowCut && fast_amp!=definitions::DefaultValue){
00193                 plots.fast_amps_slow_cut->Fill(fast_amp);
00194             }
00195 
00196         }
00197     }
00198 
00199     return 0;
00200 }
00201 
00202 int PlotTDPs::AfterLastEntry(TGlobalData* gData,const TSetupData *setup){
00203     // Draw and save all histograms
00204     for(PlotsList_t::iterator i_source=fPlotsList.begin();
00205             i_source!=fPlotsList.end(); ++i_source){
00206         i_source->second.amplitudes->Draw();
00207         i_source->second.slow_only_amps->Draw();
00208         i_source->second.fast_only_amps->Draw();
00209         i_source->second.fast_amps_slow_cut->Draw();
00210         i_source->second.slow_amps_fast_cut->Draw();
00211         i_source->second.time_diff_fast->Draw();
00212         i_source->second.time_diff_slow->Draw();
00213     }
00214 
00215   return 0;
00216 }

00218 ALCAP_REGISTER_MODULE(PlotTDPs,slow_ch_cut,fast_ch_cut);
